text: Jack Andrew Lowden (born 2 June 1990) is a Scottish actor. He is known for his roles as Nikolai Rostov in War & Peace and River Cartwright in Slow Horses. He won a Laurence Olivier Award for his role in Ghosts in 2014. In 2024, Lowden married American-Irish actress Saoirse Ronan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Actors from Essex Category:Laurence Olivier Award winners
title: Jack Lowden
